meteringrange: ISO 100, EV 1 -19, f/ 4 at 1 Second to f/16 at 1/2000th
powersourcebattery: Two 1.5V alkaline batteries, LR44 or SR44
selftimer: Mechanical self-timer with 10 sec operating time
viewfinder: Very Bright Combined Rangefinder / Viewfinder with 35, 50, 75, 90 Parallax Corrected Brightline Frames
lensmount: M-mount (accepts Bayonet Mount lenses from Leica, Canon, Contax, Voigtlander & others as well as all 39mm screw mount lenses (with the appropriate adapter) from Canon, Leica & Voigtlander,
exposuremetering: Center-weighted average metering TTL Metering with superb 3 LED readout in finder
